resources.string: You can create a shopping list by clicking this button. When creating the list you have to specify your shopping budget. Once the list is created, click on it.
After creating the list, if you click on the name of the list, you will find such a button on another page. Add product with description by clicking this button.
Clicking this icon, next to the list name,
you can change your shopping list name and budget.
To delete your shopping list just swipe it to right
To change any product name, quantity, unit or price, just click on the product name in your shopping list.
This app, Bazaar-Hisab, will help you to make shopping list with your budget easily.
Click on the product name and update the product name, quantity, unit and cost.
If you want to remove a product from the list, just swipe it to right. Product will be dropped from the list. At the bottom you will see an undo option.

Enter the price of each 1 unit quantity of product. For example, if your desired product is 2 pens, enter the price of 1 pen here. If it is 2 kg of pulses again, write the price of 1 kg of pulses. The app will automatically calculate the exact price from the quantity and price of each unit you provide.
Enter the name of your desired product. Such as: potato, onion, oil etc.

Enter the measurable unit of your desired product here. For example, if your product is 2 kg of pulses, then write kg here. Similarly, if your product has 2 pens, write unit here. Similarly write gram, kg, tee, back, bag, hali, ati etc.
Just enter the quantity of the product. For example, if your desired product is 3 kg of pulses, here you will just type 3. Similarly, if the product is 2 pens, just write 2 here.
